name: Masjien
description:
Masjien is a game about programming. The players can either write out code or use the block editor (which converts what you make to java) so it should be a pretty nice way to learn programming!

The game is still heavily in Alpha so please go easy on it! The first stage of this alpha is getting it to run on other people's computers.

The tutorial series can be found here (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_vTWEoNauOo)

The sound track is made by flat battery which can be found here:
https://soundcloud.com/flatbattery
